address.street: Finance Department, Garda Headquarters, Phoenix Park, Dublin 8

procedure.title: T.004/2024 Pre-Qualification Questionnaire for requests to participate in a Competition for the supply of Enterprise Solutions for the provision of Computational and Data Storage Resources
procedure.description: The Garda Commissioner (“the Contracting Authority”) invites requests to participate to this pre-qualification questionnaire (“PQQ”) from economic operators for the provision of Enterprise Solutions for the provision of Computational and Data Storage resources, for An Garda Síochána; and, for the provision of maintenance, support and lifecycle management Services in respect of the Goods.
